title: Facemask

The face mask can be bought from any Slayer Master for 200 coins. There is a mask spawn inside a locked cage on the top floor of Kourend Castle, however the only way to pick it up is with telegrab.

Item ID4164

A facemask is a Slayer item worn on the headgear armour slot, requiring level 10 Slayer to wear, which cannot be boosted. The face mask can be bought from any Slayer Master for 200 coins. There is a mask spawn inside a locked cage on the top floor of Kourend Castle, however the only way to pick it up is with telegrab.

It must be worn when fighting dust devils otherwise they will dramatically decrease players' stats.

Wearing a facemask or Slayer helmet also reduces the effectiveness of Nex's virus attack.

During Mourning's End Part II, if the player has not yet acquired a Death talisman through other means, Thorgel will supply the player with one, upon delivering a list of items to him which include a face mask.

This item is required to craft a Slayer helmet.

[[File:Facemask chathead.png|left]]
A '''facemask''' is a [[Slayer]] item worn on the headgear armour slot, requiring level 10 [[Slayer]] to wear, which cannot be boosted. The face mask can be bought from any [[Slayer Master]] for 200 coins. There is a mask spawn inside a locked cage on the top floor of [[Kourend Castle]], however the only way to pick it up is with [[Telekinetic Grab|telegrab]].

It must be worn when fighting [[dust devils]] otherwise they will dramatically decrease players' stats.

Wearing a facemask or [[Slayer helmet]] also reduces the effectiveness of [[Nex]]'s virus attack.

During [[Mourning's End Part II]], if the player has not yet acquired a [[Death talisman]] through other means, [[Thorgel]] will supply the player with one, upon delivering a list of items to him which include a face mask. 

This item is required to craft a [[Slayer helmet]].
